New Records: Kylian Mbappé is involved in 80 goals for France in 78 games
Key Match Events: Jonathan Clauss scored from an Mbappé pass
Mbappé scored his 47th goal for Les Bleus
Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps praised Mbappé's leadership and adaptation to Real Madrid
Post-Match Reflections: Bradley Barcola expressed pride in his debut and assist
Didier Deschamps highlighted Mbappé's importance to the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: France's next matches include Canada and the Euro 2024 tournament
